name: maloja
description: Maloja is a self-hosted music listening tracker, similar to Last.fm. It tracks play history locally and offers detailed stats, charts, artist history, and API accessâ€”all without third-party tracking.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Record every song you listen to with timestamps and metadata for personal analytics

features.title: Statistics Dashboard
features.description: View listening trends, top artists, albums, and tracks over customizable time periods

features.title: REST API
features.description: Compatible with Last.fm scrobbling clients and supports standard scrobbling protocols

features.title: Charts And Graphs
features.description: Visualize listening habits with interactive charts showing patterns over time

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: All data stays on your server with no third-party tracking or data sharing

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Add or edit scrobbles manually for offline listening or corrections

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Import existing scrobble history from Last.fm or other services
